title: When did Linkin Park make it big? - Quora

response.answer_text: Simple. AMAZING COMPOSITION. DEEPEST MEANING IN LYRICS. MOST VERSATILE SINGER ( RIP CHESTER BENNINGTON. There will be none like him. Not everyone can do the magic what he done with his voice. Doesn’t matter genre. he always nailed it.). GREAT RAP COLLABORATION. VAST MUSIC EXPERIMENT. POWERFUL COMBINATION OF TALENTED GUITARIST, DRUMMER, RAPPER, VOCALIST.
